INDICATOR_NAME: Poverty headcount ratio at $6.85 a day (2017 PPP) (% of population)
SOURCE_NOTE: Poverty headcount ratio at $6.85 a day is the percentage of the population living on less than $6.85 a day at 2017 international prices.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: World Bank, Poverty and Inequality Platform. Data are based on primary household survey data obtained from government statistical agencies and World Bank country departments. Data for high-income economies are mostly from the Luxembourg Income Study database. For more information and methodology, please see http://pip.worldbank.org.
